description.name: Welding Auto Darkening Filter Solar Lens
description.long_desc:
Welding Auto Darkening Filter. Provides full protection against UV and IR radiation during the entire welding process.


Product Features



  • Auto Darkening Filter

  • Light shade state DIN 4

  • Externally variable shade DIN 9-13

  • Shading level / Grinding function switch knob

  • Field of view 92 x 42 mm

  • Filter size 115 x 90 x 9 mm

  • Adjustable sensitivity

  • Delay adjustment knob

  • Solar with built-in battery

  • Grinding function

  • Complies with the harmonized European Standards: EN 379, CE

description.name: Welding Helmet Auto-darkening GEKO
description.long_desc:
GEKO Auto-Darkening Welding Mask


The auto-darkening welding helmet is designed to protect the eyes and face during welding from sparks, splashes, and harmful UV and IR radiation. The mask is suitable for welding with all methods using an electric arc - shielded metal arc welding (SMAW) with covered electrodes, as well as semi-automatic gas-shielded welding (MIG-MAG) and tungsten inert gas welding (TIG). Additionally, TIG welding (-) with low current (20A) is also possible.


In the filter cassette, there are two photosensors that react to the welding arc's light, automatically identifying the start of welding and activating the auto-darkening function. After completing the work, the filter automatically returns to the clear state. The auto-darkening filter is powered by a built-in battery charged by solar cells.


The possibility to adjust parameters and the mask's size allows for proper adaptation of the product to the type of work and customer expectations.


Product Features



  • The helmet is made of durable polymer material

  • Wide field of view

  • Automatic on/off switch

  • Adjustment of the darkening level and photosensor sensitivity

  • Automatic adaptation to the welding mode

  • Possibility to adjust the mask to the user's head size

  • Lightweight

  • Protection against UV and IR radiation


Technical Data



  • Light state shading level: 4 according to DIN

  • Dark state shading range: 9 - 13 according to DIN

  • Switching delay (light to dark): 1/10000 s

  • Switching delay (dark to light): 0.1 - 0.8

  • Eye protection according to standard: EN379

  • Face protection according to standard: EN175

  • UV/IR protection: full

  • Operating temperature: -10°C to +65°C

  • Field of view: 92.5 x 42.5 mm

  • Filter dimensions: 110 x 90 x 9 mm

  • Sensitivity: smooth adjustment
description.short_desc:
GEKO Auto-Darkening Welding Mask


The auto-darkening welding helmet is designed to protect the eyes and face during welding from sparks, splashes, and harmful UV and IR radiation. The mask is suitable for welding with all methods using an electric arc - shielded metal arc welding (SMAW) with covered electrodes, as well as semi-automatic gas-shielded welding (MIG-MAG) and tungsten inert gas welding (TIG). Additionally, TIG welding (-) with low current (20A) is also possible.


In the filter cassette, there are two photosensors that react to the welding arc's light, automatically identifying the start of welding and activating the auto-darkening function. After completing the work, the filter automatically returns to the clear state. The auto-darkening filter is powered by a built-in battery charged by solar cells.


The possibility to adjust parameters and the mask's size allows for proper adaptation of the product to the type of work and customer expectations.


Product Features



  • The helmet is made of durable polymer material

  • Wide field of view

  • Automatic on/off switch

  • Adjustment of the darkening level and photosensor sensitivity

  • Automatic adaptation to the welding mode

  • Possibility to adjust the mask to the user's head size

  • Lightweight

  • Protection against UV and IR radiation


Technical Data

  • Dark state shading range: 9 - 13 according to DIN

  • Switching delay (light to dark): 1/10000 s

  • Switching delay (dark to light): 0.1 - 0.8

  • Eye protection according to standard: EN379

  • Face protection according to standard: EN175

  • UV/IR protection: full

  • Operating temperature: -10°C to +65°C

  • Field of view: 92.5 x 42.5 mm

  • Filter dimensions: 110 x 90 x 9 mm

  • Sensitivity: smooth adjustment

description.name: Welding Helmet Auto-darkening PROFI-GREY
description.long_desc:
Welding Helmet with Auto Darkening Filter. Provides full protection against UV and IR radiation during the entire welding process.


Fields of application:



  • MMA

  • MIG/MAG

  • TIG

  • Grinding


Product Features



  • Auto Darkening Filter

  • Light shade state DIN 4

  • Externally variable shade DIN 9-13

  • Shading level / Grinding function switch knob

  • Field of view 92,5 x 42,5 mm

  • Filter size 115 x 90 x 9 mm

  • Adjustable sensitivity

  • Delay adjustment knob

  • Solar with built-in battery (2x AAA)

  • Grinding function

  • Complies with the harmonized European Standards: EN 379, EN 175, CE

description.name: Welding Mask with Lift-up Face Shield
description.long_desc:
Welding Shield provides UV ray protection and covers the entire face to protect from sparks and spatter.


Product Features



  • High-density polymer nylon welding face and shield

  • Flip-up visor

  • Lens size 108 x 50mm with shade state DIN 11

  • Adjustable ratchet harness

  • Complies with the harmonized European Standards: EN 375, CE

description.name: Royal Blue Tarpaulin +/-5%
description.long_desc:
Royal Blue Tarpaulin. Made of polypropylene, covered on both sides with a layer of polyethylene.


  • Aluminium eyelets at 1 metre intervals

  • Rope reinforced hems

  • waterproof and
    easily washable

  • mildew resistant



We offer sizes from 2x3m to 15x20m.

description.name: Royal Blue Tarpaulin 2x3m +/-5%
description.long_desc:
Tarpaulin made of polypropylene cross-woven strands, covered on both sides with a layer of polyethylene. Rope-reinforced hems. Aluminum eyelets at 1 m intervals.


Application: Tarpaulins are used in many ways to things from wind, rain, and sunlight. They are used to protect the loads of open trucks and wagons, to keep wood piles dry, and for shelters such as tents or other temporary structures.


Product Features



  • Waterproof

  • Mold-resistant and easily washable

  • Easy to use

  • Aluminum eyelets at 1 m intervals

  • Manufacturing tolerance +/- 5%

description.description:
The sides of tarpaulin are finished with doubly strengthened with a polypropylene rope. á There are aluminium 12mm holes (at every 100cm) on the whole area of the tarpaulin.á
CE Certificate
real size may differ -+5%

Tarpaulin is:
waterproof
easily washableá
mould resistantá
easy to use

colour: blueá
Tarpaulins are designed for covering and securing things inside as well as outside

description.name: Royal Blue Tarpaulin 10x15m +/-5%
description.long_desc:
Tarpaulin made of polypropylene cross-woven strands, covered on both sides with a layer of polyethylene. Rope-reinforced hems. Aluminum eyelets at 1 m intervals.


Application: Tarpaulins are used in many ways to things from wind, rain, and sunlight. They are used to protect the loads of open trucks and wagons, to keep wood piles dry, and for shelters such as tents or other temporary structures.


Product Features



  • Waterproof

  • Mold-resistant and easily washable

  • Easy to use

  • Aluminum eyelets at 1 m intervals

  • Manufacturing tolerance +/- 5%

description.name: Sandblaster Air Siphon Gun + 4x Ceramic Nozzles
description.long_desc:
Can be used for sand glass, sandblasting, surface polishing, processing machinery parts.


Product Features



  • Die-cast aluminum body

  • Minimum air requirement: 6 CFM at 80 PSI

  • Includes four ceramic nozzles: 4mm, 5mm, 6mm and 7mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x Siphon Feed Blast Gun

  • 1x Ceramic nozzles: 4, 5, 6, 7 mm
description.short_desc:

description.name: Sand Blasting Gun for Sandblasting + 4x Ceramic Nozzles
description.long_desc:
This gun fits most pressure and cabinet sandblasters. Sand blasting gun can be used for sand glass, sandblasting, surface polishing, processing machinery parts.


Product Features



  • Its operating lever is very comfortable and well suited for continuous operation.

  • Includes four ceramic nozzles: 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm and 3.5mm

  • Spring loaded paddle trigger


Technical Data



  • Operating pressure: 60 - 120 PSI

  • Air Inlet: 1/4"


Package Contents:



  • 1x Siphon Feed Blast Gun

  • 4x Ceramic Nozzles: 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5 mm

description.name: 20 Ton Hydraulic Pump
description.long_desc:
POMPA HYDRAULICZNA 20T DO PRASY / ROZPIERAKA

Pompa hydrauliczna umożliwia wygenerowanie nacisku o sile 20 ton. Do stosowania w prasach oraz rozpierakach hydraulicznych.

Cechy produktu:

  • wysoka jakość wykonania
  • przeznaczona do stosowania w prasach oraz rozpierakach hydraulicznych
  • generuje nacisk o sile 20 ton
  • wąż hydrauliczny o długości 1400 mm

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Maksymalny nacisk: 20T
  • Długość przewodów hydraulicznych: 1400 mm

description.name: Hydraulic 2-Speed Pump for 30 Ton Shop Press
description.long_desc:
POMPA HYDRAULICZNA DWUSTOPNIOWA 30T

Pompa wyposażona została w dwa tłoki umożliwiające szybki oraz wolny (precyzyjny) wysuw tłoka. Pompa pozwala na wygenerowanie nacisku o sile 30T.

Cechy produktu:

  • wysoka jakość wykonania
  • pompa dwustopniowa z szybkim i wolnym biegiem
  • generuje nacisk o sile 30T

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Maksymalny nacisk: 30T
  • Wysokość pompy: ok. 460 mm
  • Wymiary podstawy: 110x140 mm

  • Wymiary podstawy: 110x140 mm
description.description:
POMPA HYDRAULICZNA DWUSTOPNIOWA 30T

Pompa wyposażona została w dwa tłoki umożliwiające szybki oraz wolny (precyzyjny) wysuw tłoka. Pompa pozwala na wygenerowanie nacisku o sile 30T.

Cechy produktu:

  • wysoka jakość wykonania
  • pompa dwustopniowa z szybkim i wolnym biegiem
  • generuje nacisk o sile 30T

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Maksymalny nacisk: 30T
  • Wysokość pompy: ok. 460 mm
  • Wymiary podstawy: 110x140 mm
